Doctor Who (2005)

(a Titles & Air Dates Guide)

Last updated: Sat, 26 Dec 2020 -1:00
Previous
 
Auto / Stop
 
Next
A human-looking alien from a destroyed planet travels through time and space, having adventures and protecting the innocent from various dangers.
Show Details:
Start date: Mar 2005
End date: ___ ____
Status: current show
Network(s): BBC One (UK)
Run time: 45 min
Episodes: 130+ eps & 20+ specials
Genre(s): Drama, Science Fiction
